summary: Lydia standing, running and walking as a woman.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]
Lydia Feminine[/size][/color][/b]

[size=2][b]You need only The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim.[/b]

She is standing, running and walking as a woman with this files.
Her weight was 100 before. 0 now.
Her height was 1,0. Now 0,95.
She was aggressive before, now unaggressive with this file.
Her energy was 50, now 100.
Her speed was 100, now 200.
She is no more protected. She can die.[/size]

[size=2][color=#ffff00]Install to meet Lydia before[/color].
Or you need a new game.[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=2]Doesn't work with old saves[/size][/color].
[size=2]May be you try [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67985]Fast Start with Save Games Dovahkiin[/url] for alternative start without escape from Helgen.
You can start after escape from Helgen Keep with these save games.

[/size]Use my other mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81011]Lydia Came Back[/url] if Lydia dead.

[size=4][url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819?tab=user+files]MY MODS[/url][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819/?tb=mods&pUp=1]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81011]
[/url]
author: cengo
